attributes.additional_details:
Because its the law they set out and the rules they set, for funerals, care homes, hospitals, hospices and more.

An enquiry (without favour or affection malice or ill will)
attributes.background: WE DEMAND an independent enquiry into ALL PARTYS and those who attended.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

An investigation has already been held into alleged gatherings on government premises during periods when there were covid-19 restrictions. You can read the report resulting from this investigation here: https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/1051374/Investigation_into_alleged_gatherings_on_government_premises_during_Covid_restrictions_-_Update.pdf

Some of these gatherings are now being investigated by the police. Decisions about investigating alleged offences and prosecuting these are a matter for the police and Crown Prosecution Service, not the Government or Parliament.
